amendment.description: Amendment adds veterans to the list of priority grantees in Title V and adds to the allowable uses of funds, programs that prepare students to enter careers in the Veterans Administration and occupations in energy-related fields.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in House Report 111-256 to add veterans to the list of priority grantees in Title V. Also, would add to the allowable uses of funds programs that prepare students to enter careers in the Veterans Administration, and occupations in energy-related fields.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Teague amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
